title: Week In Politics: Hagel's Resignation, Ferguson Grand Jury Decision
teaser: NPR's Ari Shapiro speaks with E.J. Dionne of The Washington Post and Brookings Institution and David Brooks of the New York Times about the grand jury's decision not to indict police officer Darren Wilson and the resignation of Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
